title: Ep - 47 - Jersey Shore's "The Situation"
description:
Mike Sorrentino "The Situation" of Jersey Shore 


Mike "The Situation" Sorrentino from MTV’s mega-hit Jersey Shore talks about being cast on the show, the impact of fame, and how he hid from producers his addiction. Kate and her sister Megan compare Dean's father on The Bachelorette to their own dad and her friend MKat, a dental hygienist and Richard Simmons impersonator gives her review of the season premiere of Shahs of Sunset. 


www.loveandknuckles.com

Facebook: facebook.com/loveandknuckles

Twitter: @katecasey

Instagram: @katecaseyca
